comment.author: 37996646559@N01
comment._content: Wow!  There's a Wonder Bread--bag rug hanging in the American Folk Art Museum in New York that I thought was sui generis.  I guess not!  Maybe Heloise hinted about clever things to do with plastic bags, and there are similar works in attics throughout America.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Very creative recycling!
Kristen (U.S. National Archives)
